name: Verify if the pet data is updated successfully in database

testSteps.description: Example: {id=71, name=doggie, status=available, categoryId=1, categoryName=Cats, tagId=0, tagName=string, photoUrlValue=string}

children.description: Given Pet Payload "71", "doggie", "available", "1", "Cats", "0", "string", "string", "base.url"
When user calls "UpdatePetAPI" with "PUT" http request
Then the API call is successful with status code 200
And checking if the "category.name" of the pet created is "Cats"

title: Verify if the pet data is updated successfully in database

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given Pet Payload "<id>", "<name>", "<status>", "<categoryId>", "<categoryName>", "<tagId>", "<tagName>", "<photoUrlValue>", "base.url"
When user calls "UpdatePetAPI" with "PUT" http request
Then the API call is successful with status code 200
And checking if the "category.name" of the pet created is "<categoryName>"
